original_text: For your obedience is known to all, so that I rejoice over you, but I want you to be wise as to what is good and innocent as to what is evil.
korean_text: 너희의 순종함이 모든 사람에게 들리는지라 그러므로 내가 너희로 말미암아 기뻐하노니 너희가 선한 데 지혜롭고 악한 데 미련하기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: For your obedience is known to all
so that I rejoice over you
but I want you to be wise as to what is good
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 너희가 선한 일에 지혜롭기를 원합니다

sentences.original_text: and innocent as to what is evil.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 악한 것에 대해서는 순수하기를 원합니다.
